name: bookmark-shortcut
description: Open bookmarks via custom aliases in the omnibox

scripts.build:ext: npm run build && npm run build:css && node scripts/build-ext.js
scripts.watch:ext: nodemon --watch popup --watch options --watch *.ts --watch *.html --watch *.css --watch manifest.json --ext ts,html,css,json --ignore dist --ignore ext --ignore node_modules --exec "npm run build:ext"
